I came across this guy's website and thought it was pretty
interesting, esp. to folks like Mattias and Tyler who are interested
in evolving neural network controllers for 3D creatures/agents:

http://www.unm.edu/~keithw/artificialLife.html

This guy evolved neural network controllers for a quadruped, going
through similar stages as Tyler (first standing, then walking, then
walking downhill).  He used an environment called Breve for physcis
rendering, kinematics, etc., and it uses the ODE as well.

Derek
